The |en|sign: '[[Â¥]]'; code: 'JPY'}} is the official currency of Japan. It is
the third most traded currency in the foreign exchange market after the United
States dollar and the euro. http://www.bis.org/publ/rpfxf07t.pdf It is
also widely used as a reserve currency after the U.S. dollar, the euro and the
pound sterling.
